10/4/2004 : It can tap itself but is not required to do so.

card.name: Shock
card.ability: Shock deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
card.flavor:
"I love lightning It's my best invention since the rock."
—Toggo, goblin weaponsmith

card.name: Sigil of the New Dawn
card.ability: Whenever a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}{W}. If you do, return that card to your hand.
card.flavor:
"We lay our dead to rest in a beautiful bed, in hopes that the Ancestor will think it a fit cradle for the next life."
—Mystic elder

card.name: Silent Specter
card.ability:
Flying
Whenever Silent Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player discards two cards.
Morph {3}{B}{B} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

card.name: Silklash Spider
card.ability:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
{X}{G}{G}: Silklash Spider deals X damage to each creature with flying.
card.flavor: The only thing that flies over the Krosan Forest is the wind.

card.name: Silvos, Rogue Elemental
card.ability:
Trample
{G}: Regenerate Silvos, Rogue Elemental.
card.flavor: He was born of the Mirari, thrust out of his homeland before he was even aware. Left without purpose or meaning, he found both in the pits.

card.name: Skirk Commando
card.ability:
Whenever Skirk Commando deals combat damage to a player, you may have it deal 2 damage to target creature that player controls.

Protection from red

card.name: Skirk Prospector
card.ability: Sacrifice a Goblin: Add {R} to your mana pool.
card.flavor:
"I like goblins. They make funny little popping sounds when they die."
—Braids, dementia summoner

At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, turn Skittish Valesk face down.

card.name: Slate of Ancestry
card.ability: {4}, {T}, Discard your hand: Draw a card for each creature you control.

card.name: Slice and Dice

10/1/2008 : The cycling ability and the triggered ability are separate. If the triggered ability is countered (with Stifle, for example, or if all its targets have become illegal), the cycling ability will still resolve and you'll draw a card.

card.name: Slipstream Eel
card.ability:
Slipstream Eel can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
Cycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
card.flavor: "It's a fine way to travel, if you don't mind the smell."
card.ruling: 10/1/2008 : Cycling is an activated ability. Effects that interact with activated abilities (such as Stifle or Rings of Brighthearth) will interact with cycling. Effects that interact with spells (such as Remove Soul or Faerie Tauntings) will not.

card.name: Smother
card.ability: Destroy target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less. It can't be regenerated.
card.flavor:
"I can't hear them scream, but at least I don't have to listen to them beg."
—Phage the Untouchable
card.ruling:
3/1/2010 : A creature's converted mana cost is determined solely by the mana symbols printed in its upper right corner (unless that creature is copying something else; see below). If its mana cost includes {X}, X is considered to be 0. If it has no mana symbols in its upper right corner (because it's an animated land, for example), its converted mana cost is 0. Ignore any alternative costs or additional costs (such as kicker) paid when the creature was cast.
3/1/2010 : A token has a converted mana cost of 0, unless it is copying something else.
3/1/2010 : If a creature is copying something else, its converted mana cost is the converted mana cost of whatever it's copying.

card.name: Snapping Thragg
card.ability:
Whenever Snapping Thragg deals combat damage to a player, you may have it deal 3 damage to target creature that player controls.
Morph {4}{R}{R} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

card.name: Snarling Undorak
card.ability:
{2}{G}: Target Beast creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Morph {1}{G}{G} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
card.flavor: Most creatures in the Krosan Forest feared the Mirari's power. A few fed upon it.

card.name: Solar Blast
card.ability:
Solar Blast deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
Cycling {1}{R}{R} ({1}{R}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Solar Blast, you may have it deal 1 damage to target creature or player.
card.ruling:
10/1/2008 : Cycling is an activated ability. Effects that interact with activated abilities (such as Stifle or Rings of Brighthearth) will interact with cycling. Effects that interact with spells (such as Remove Soul or Faerie Tauntings) will not.
10/1/2008 : When you cycle this card, first the cycling ability goes on the stack, then the triggered ability goes on the stack on top of it. The triggered ability will resolve before you draw a card from the cycling ability.
10/1/2008 : The cycling ability and the triggered ability are separate. If the triggered ability is countered (with Stifle, for example, or if all its targets have become illegal), the cycling ability will still resolve and you'll draw a card.
10/1/2008 : You can cycle this card even if there are no targets for the triggered ability. That's because the cycling ability itself has no targets.

card.name: Soulless One
card.ability: Soulless One's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Zombies on the battlefield plus the number of Zombie cards in all graveyards.
card.flavor: "Surrender your soul to me."

card.name: Sparksmith
card.ability: {T}: Sparksmith deals X damage to target creature and X damage to you, where X is the number of Goblins on the battlefield.
card.flavor: "If it didn't hurt, how would I know it worked?"

card.name: Spined Basher
card.ability: Morph {2}{B} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
card.flavor:
"How cute. Does it do any other tricks?"
—Braids, dementia summoner

card.name: Spitfire Handler
card.ability:
Spitfire Handler can't block creatures with power greater than Spitfire Handler's power.
{R}: Spitfire Handler gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
card.flavor: "Wait 'til Toggo sees this"

card.name: Spitting Gourna
card.ability:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Morph {4}{G} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

card.name: Spurred Wolverine
card.ability: Tap two untapped Beasts you control: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
card.flavor: After a few painful experiences, goblins learned not to pick their noses around the beasts.
card.ruling:
10/4/2004 : Since the ability does not have the {Tap} symbol, you can use the ability before this creature begins a turn under your control.
10/4/2004 : It can tap itself but is not required to do so.

card.name: Spy Network
card.ability: Look at target player's hand, the top card of that player's library, and any face-down creatures he or she controls. Look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : Only you get to look. You can't show them to others.

card.name: Stag Beetle
card.ability: Stag Beetle enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of other creatures on the battlefield.
card.flavor: Its voice crackles with the hum of a thousand wings beating at once.
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : The value of X is calculated once, as Stag Beetle is entering the battlefield.

card.name: Standardize
card.ability: Choose a creature type other than Wall. Each creature becomes that type until end of turn.
card.flavor: At that point, the wizards' argument got a lot uglier.
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : This spell only affects creatures on the battlefield when it resolves.

card.name: Starlit Sanctum
card.ability:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{W}, {T}, Sacrifice a Cleric creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness.
{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a Cleric creature: Target player loses life equal to the sacrificed creature's power.

card.name: Starstorm
card.ability:
Starstorm deals X damage to each creature.
Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
card.flavor: Pardic barbarians didn't complain when the Order started blaming every crisis on the Cabal.
card.ruling: 10/1/2008 : Cycling is an activated ability. Effects that interact with activated abilities (such as Stifle or Rings of Brighthearth) will interact with cycling. Effects that interact with spells (such as Remove Soul or Faerie Tauntings) will not.

card.name: Steely Resolve
card.ability:
As Steely Resolve enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Creatures of the chosen type have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)
card.flavor: No one in Wirewood understands what is happening. They just know it's unnatural—and coming from Krosa.

card.name: Strongarm Tactics
card.ability: Each player discards a card. Then each player who didn't discard a creature card this way loses 4 life.
card.flavor: "If you can't pay your gambling debts, you just might be tomorrow's main attraction at the Grand Coliseum."

card.name: Sunfire Balm
card.ability:
Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
Cycling {1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Sunfire Balm, you may prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
card.ruling:
10/1/2008 : Cycling is an activated ability. Effects that interact with activated abilities (such as Stifle or Rings of Brighthearth) will interact with cycling. Effects that interact with spells (such as Remove Soul or Faerie Tauntings) will not.
10/1/2008 : When you cycle this card, first the cycling ability goes on the stack, then the triggered ability goes on the stack on top of it. The triggered ability will resolve before you draw a card from the cycling ability.
10/1/2008 : The cycling ability and the triggered ability are separate. If the triggered ability is countered (with Stifle, for example, or if all its targets have become illegal), the cycling ability will still resolve and you'll draw a card.
10/1/2008 : You can cycle this card even if there are no targets for the triggered ability. That's because the cycling ability itself has no targets.

card.name: Supreme Inquisitor
card.ability: Tap five untapped Wizards you control: Search target player's library for up to five cards and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.
card.flavor: "It's hard to fight on an empty mind."
card.ruling:
10/4/2004 : Since the ability does not have the {Tap} symbol, you can use the ability before this creature begins a turn under your control.
10/4/2004 : It can tap itself but is not required to do so.

card.name: Swat
card.ability:
Destroy target creature with power 2 or less.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
card.flavor: Few who cross Phage have the chance to repeat the mistake.
card.ruling: 10/1/2008 : Cycling is an activated ability. Effects that interact with activated abilities (such as Stifle or Rings of Brighthearth) will interact with cycling. Effects that interact with spells (such as Remove Soul or Faerie Tauntings) will not.

card.name: Symbiotic Beast
card.ability: When Symbiotic Beast dies, put four 1/1 green Insect creature tokens onto the battlefield.
card.flavor: The insects found a meal in the carrion of the beast's prey. The beast found a spiffy new hairstyle.

card.name: Symbiotic Elf
card.ability: When Symbiotic Elf dies, put two 1/1 green Insect creature tokens onto the battlefield.
card.flavor: The elves arriving in Wirewood had no homes, let alone weapons, but they knew that the forest would always provide.

card.name: Symbiotic Wurm
card.ability: When Symbiotic Wurm dies, put seven 1/1 green Insect creature tokens onto the battlefield.
card.flavor: The insects keep the wurm's hide free from parasites. In return, the wurm doesn't eat the insects.

card.name: Syphon Mind
card.ability: Each other player discards a card. You draw a card for each card discarded this way.
card.flavor: When tempers run high, it's easy to lose your head.

card.name: Syphon Soul
card.ability: Syphon Soul deals 2 damage to each other player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
card.flavor: As Phage drank their energy, a vague memory of Jeska stirred. Then she lost herself again in the joy of her victims' suffering.

card.name: Taunting Elf
card.ability: All creatures able to block Taunting Elf do so.
card.flavor: The safety of the village depends on the beast thinking with its stomach.

card.name: Tempting Wurm
card.ability: When Tempting Wurm enters the battlefield, each opponent may put any number of artifact, creature, enchantment, and/or land cards from his or her hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Tephraderm
card.ability:
Whenever a creature deals damage to Tephraderm, Tephraderm deals that much damage to that creature.
Whenever a spell deals damage to Tephraderm, Tephraderm deals that much damage to that spell's controller.
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : The second ability triggers even if this card is dealt lethal damage.

card.name: Thoughtbound Primoc
card.ability:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, if a player controls more Wizards than each other player, the player who controls the most Wizards gains control of Thoughtbound Primoc.
card.flavor: Efforts to use them as spies failed when they kept reporting to the enemy.

card.name: Thrashing Mudspawn
card.ability:
Whenever Thrashing Mudspawn is dealt damage, you lose that much life.
Morph {1}{B}{B} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
card.flavor: It just obeys you. It doesn't like you.

card.name: Threaten
card.ability: Untap target creature and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
card.flavor: Goblins' motivational techniques are crude, but effective.

card.name: Thunder of Hooves
card.ability: Thunder of Hooves deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player, where X is the number of Beasts on the battlefield.

card.name: Towering Baloth
card.ability: Morph {6}{G} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
card.flavor: The Mirari twisted all that lived in the Krosan Forest into gross mockeries of their former selves.

card.name: Trade Secrets
card.ability: Target opponent draws two cards, then you draw up to four cards. That opponent may repeat this process as many times as he or she chooses.

card.name: Tranquil Thicket
card.ability:
Tranquil Thicket enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
Cycling {G} ({G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
card.ruling: 10/1/2008 : Cycling is an activated ability. Effects that interact with activated abilities (such as Stifle or Rings of Brighthearth) will interact with cycling. Effects that interact with spells (such as Remove Soul or Faerie Tauntings) will not.

card.name: Treespring Lorian
card.ability: Morph {5}{G} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
card.flavor: No matter your strength, the Krosan Forest is stronger. No matter your speed, the Wirewood Forest is faster.

card.name: Tribal Golem
card.ability: Tribal Golem has trample as long as you control a Beast, haste as long as you control a Goblin, first strike as long as you control a Soldier, flying as long as you control a Wizard, and "{B}: Regenerate Tribal Golem" as long as you control a Zombie.

card.name: Tribal Unity
card.ability: Creatures of the creature type of your choice get +X/+X until end of turn.
card.flavor: Kamahl left the violence of his former life behind him, but he still believes in the power of muscle.

card.name: Trickery Charm
card.ability: Choose one — Target creature gains flying until end of turn; or target creature becomes the creature type of your choice until end of turn; or look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

card.name: True Believer
card.ability: You have shroud. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
card.flavor: So great is his certainty that mere facts cannot shake it.

card.name: Undead Gladiator
card.ability:
{1}{B}, Discard a card: Return Undead Gladiator from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
Cycling {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
card.ruling:
10/4/2004 : The ability to return to your hand can only be activated while this card is in your graveyard.
10/1/2008 : Cycling is an activated ability. Effects that interact with activated abilities (such as Stifle or Rings of Brighthearth) will interact with cycling. Effects that interact with spells (such as Remove Soul or Faerie Tauntings) will not.

card.name: Unholy Grotto
card.ability:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{B}, {T}: Put target Zombie card from your graveyard on top of your library.

card.name: Unified Strike
card.ability: Exile target attacking creature if its power is less than or equal to the number of Soldiers on the battlefield.
card.flavor: The tall, reedy grass of the Daru Plains rustles loudly in the winds, a perfect cover for any ambush.

card.name: Venomspout Brackus
card.ability:
{1}{G}, {T}: Venomspout Brackus deals 5 damage to target attacking or blocking creature with flying.
Morph {3}{G}{G} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

card.name: Visara the Dreadful
card.ability:
Flying
{T}: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.
card.flavor: "My eyes are my strongest feature."

card.name: Vitality Charm
card.ability: Choose one — Put a 1/1 green Insect creature token onto the battlefield; or target creature gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn; or regenerate target Beast.

card.name: Voice of the Woods
card.ability: Tap five untapped Elves you control: Put a 7/7 green Elemental creature token with trample onto the battlefield.
card.flavor: The ritual of making draws upon the elves' memories and pasts. And elves have long memories and ancient pasts.
card.ruling:
10/4/2004 : Since the ability does not have the {Tap} symbol, you can use the ability before this creature begins a turn under your control.
10/4/2004 : It can tap itself but is not required to do so.

card.name: Voidmage Prodigy
card.ability:
{U}{U}, Sacrifice a Wizard: Counter target spell.
Morph {U} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

card.name: Walking Desecration
card.ability: {B}, {T}: Creatures of the creature type of your choice attack this turn if able.
card.flavor: Such sacrilege turns blinding grief into blinding rage.

card.name: Wall of Mulch
card.ability:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{G}, Sacrifice a Wall: Draw a card.
card.flavor: Mulch is the fabric of life in the forest. Plants live in it, they die in it, and then they become part of it, feeding countless generations to come.
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : It can be sacrificed for its own ability.

card.name: Wave of Indifference
card.ability: X target creatures can't block this turn.
card.flavor:
"Darius?"
"Yeah?"
"There's a goblin sneaking up on you."
"So?"
"Just sayin'."

card.name: Weathered Wayfarer
card.ability: {W}, {T}: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls more lands than you.

card.name: Weird Harvest
card.ability: Each player may search his or her library for up to X creature cards, reveal those cards, and put them into his or her hand. Then each player who searched his or her library this way shuffles it.
card.flavor: Krosa's distorted groves bear strange fruit.

card.name: Wellwisher
card.ability: {T}: You gain 1 life for each Elf on the battlefield.
card.flavor: "Close your ears to the voice of greed, and you can turn a gift for one into a gift for many."

card.name: Wheel and Deal
card.ability:
Any number of target opponents each discards his or her hand and draws seven cards.
Draw a card.
card.ruling:
10/4/2004 : You can choose to target zero opponents.
10/4/2004 : You can't target yourself.

card.name: Whipcorder
card.ability:
{W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
Morph {W} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
card.flavor: His bolas whirl like galaxies, but it's his enemies who see stars.

card.name: Windswept Heath
card.ability: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Windswept Heath: Search your library for a Forest or Plains card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Wirewood Elf
card.ability: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
card.flavor: "The land belongs to nature as far as our eyes can see. The higher we climb, the more we can see."

card.name: Wirewood Herald
card.ability: When Wirewood Herald dies, you may search your library for an Elf card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
card.flavor: The goblins laughed as the elf ran away, until more came back.

card.name: Wirewood Lodge
card.ability:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{G}, {T}: Untap target Elf.

card.name: Wirewood Pride
card.ability: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves on the battlefield.
card.flavor: "Though you may leave this haven we have found, may our strength never leave you."

card.name: Wirewood Savage
card.ability: Whenever a Beast enters the battlefield, you may draw a card.
card.flavor:
"She is truly Wirewood's child now."
—Elvish refugee

card.name: Withering Hex
card.ability:
Enchant creature
Whenever a player cycles a card, put a plague counter on Withering Hex.
Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 for each plague counter on Withering Hex.

card.name: Wooded Foothills
card.ability: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Wooded Foothills: Search your library for a Mountain or Forest card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Words of War
card.ability: {1}: The next time you would draw a card this turn, Words of War deals 2 damage to target creature or player instead.
card.flavor:
"Passions can't be shackled by laws or mastered with logic. The choice is freedom or death."
—Volume IV, The Book of Fire
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : If multiple Words have been used prior to drawing a card, then you can choose which one to apply (and use up) each time you draw a card.

card.name: Words of Waste
card.ability: {1}: The next time you would draw a card this turn, each opponent discards a card instead.
card.flavor:
"Terror corrupts order and paralyzes instinct."
—Volume III, The Book of Decay
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : If multiple Words have been used prior to drawing a card, then you can choose which one to apply (and use up) each time you draw a card.

card.name: Words of Wilding
card.ability: {1}: The next time you would draw a card this turn, put a 2/2 green Bear creature token onto the battlefield instead.
card.flavor:
"Instinct is undaunted by terror, unchained by logic. It is the path from which all other paths diverge."
—Volume V, The Book of Life
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : If multiple Words have been used prior to drawing a card, then you can choose which one to apply (and use up) each time you draw a card.

card.name: Words of Wind
card.ability: {1}: The next time you would draw a card this turn, each player returns a permanent he or she controls to its owner's hand instead.
card.flavor:
"Be logical in all things. Do not allow instinct or passion to cloud your mind."
—Volume II, The Book of Insight
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : If multiple Words have been used prior to drawing a card, then you can choose which one to apply (and use up) each time you draw a card.

card.name: Words of Worship
card.ability: {1}: The next time you would draw a card this turn, you gain 5 life instead.
card.flavor:
"The faithful don't succumb to terror, nor are they ruled by passion. They adhere to order, for order is life."
—Volume I, The Book of Faith
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : If multiple Words have been used prior to drawing a card, then you can choose which one to apply (and use up) each time you draw a card.

card.name: Wretched Anurid
card.ability: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you lose 1 life.
card.flavor: The only prince inside this frog is the one it ate.
